entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
